sentence: That kind of pattern is not sustainable.

Procter & Gamble's 3% dividend increase was its lowest in over 10 years, but with currency headwinds, flat organic growth, and cash constraints, that kind of modest increase will likely become the new normal.
Investors in search of more aggressive dividend growth will simply have to look elsewhere.

One bleeding-edge technology is about to put the World Wide Web to bed.
